generated_description: estermann edv systeme is a company based in schärding, bezirk schärding, specializing in enterprise resource planning (erp) systems. the company provides modern industry solutions for land technology businesses, motor vehicle dealers, import companies, and the meat and slaughter industry. since 2012, markus estermann has led the company, focusing on optimizing existing software through modern interfaces and effective components to enhance daily work efficiency. estermann edv systeme aims to expand its market position in austria over the next five to ten years by delivering modern programs and effective support to its clients.
